messages.title: Make a Plan to Vote
messages.content: Make a plan to vote on 8th June and back Theresa May to lead Britain’s Brexit negotiations.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Getting Brexit right is central to everything – our economic security, our jobs, our public services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A loss of just 6 seats and Theresa May’s government loses its majority – putting Brexit negotiations at risk.

issues.brexitEurope: EU wants Brexit negotiations to start 11 days after you vote. Don't risk Jeremy Corbyn becoming PM and messing up Brexit.
issues.economy: Getting Brexit right is central to our economic security.
issues.health: We will deliver better days for a strong NHS.
issues.immigration: Sky-high immigration would continue for years under Jeremy Corbyn.
issues.socialWelfare: Looking after our elderly to educating our children.

contactInformation.address: St. James Road Methodist Church Hall, Main Hall (St. James Road Southampton)

quotes.text: Sky-high immigration would continue for years under Jeremy Corbyn.
